Distribution. Holarctic, temperate. From Kaliningradskaya Oblast to Primorye, Sakhalin Isl., Kurils. Outside Russia in Europe, Turkey , Transcaucasia, N Iran , N Kazakhstan , Mongolia , NE China , Korea , Japan ( Hokkaido , Honshu, Shikoku, Kyushu, Tsushima, Okinawa isl.), N America.

Hostplants: deciduous (
Betula , Lonicera
) and coniferous (
Pinus
,
Picea
,
Abies
,
Larix
) trees and shrubs; herbaceous plants ( Raygorodskaya 1966 , 1967 ; Beljaev 2016 ).
